text: Nyaa mara ruri ke bokotlase selo se. Go na le batho ba ba duelelwang tiro e Aki. Madi a a boitshegang. Mausausa as Cebo used to say.
author: MmanalediM

text: Ke gore President Ramaphosa's speechwriters how do you feel when you hear him referring to "thuto e e emeletseng ko godimo" instead of "thuto ya boleng jo bo kwa godimo" (high quality education). On a #HumanRightsDay dedicated to languages? Mxm!! Le a kwatisa struuu.
author: MmanalediM

text: Home Affairs, state hospital, a village school, spend a day in a village and help fetch water, then taxi a taxi to every destination for a week.
author: MmanalediM

text: Sincere condolences abuti. May God grant you and family strength as you go through this painful period.
author: MmanalediM

text: At this rate someone must get off the train and walk to get the President sphatlho. They'll be back and still find the train here ...
author: MmanalediM
